tr.com.turkcellteknoloji.turkcellupdater
Interface UpdaterDialogManager.UpdaterUiListener

Enclosing class:
UpdaterDialogManager
public static interface UpdaterDialogManager.UpdaterUiListener

Provide callback methods for update checking process.

Author:
Ugur Ozmen
See Also:
UpdaterDialogManager.startUpdateCheck(Activity, UpdaterUiListener)

Method Summary
 boolean onDisplayMessage(Message message)
          Called when a message should be displayed to user.
This call always will be followed by onUpdateCheckCompleted() call.
 void onExitApplication()
          Called when application should exit immediately.
 void onUpdateCheckCompleted()
          Update check is completed.
 

Method Detail

onExitApplication

void onExitApplication()
Called when application should exit immediately. Typically this method is called in one of following conditions:
  • New version is found and ready to install. Application should be closed in order to launch new version.
  • User refused to install a mandatory update. see: Update.forceUpdate

onUpdateCheckCompleted

void onUpdateCheckCompleted()
Update check is completed. Application should continue initialization process.

onDisplayMessage

boolean onDisplayMessage(Message message)
Called when a message should be displayed to user.
This call always will be followed by onUpdateCheckCompleted() call. if this method returns message will be handled by application and displayed to user later by calling UpdaterDialogManager.createMessageDialog(Activity, Message, DialogInterface.OnDismissListener) . method
if this method returns message will be automatically displayed to user immediately.

Parameters:
message - Message that will be displayed to user.
Returns:
true if message is handled by application it self.
